HkQXCFu1nPUc4_CE-Q3xRA.text: I didn't know what to try first. I ended up getting the turkey, bacon, ranch wrap. Everything looked so fresh! It was a good size wrap. It is a great place if you are looking for something healthy. Great place to grab something and go. There is seating inside and they even have a couple of small tables outside.

HtuwKT1Z69ASEDQjZ8qzjw.text: This is my favorite health restaurant! It is very well priced and the food options are diverse to fit any health need. I pretty much live there where I don't feel like cooking dinner.

Cq6VqNY-50fmUnsU74bGNw.text: This is a REALLY nice healthy, "fast" food place.  The food is always freshly prepared right in front of you. I have ordered the salmon bowl a number of times and it really is fantastic. My husband has ordered the flat bread pizzas--both the BBQ and buffalo chicken pizzas and they are outstanding!!!  The portions are also good size so you get a lot of food for the money.  Definitely one of our new favorite places to eat.

dhAAlr5AN6LGsomOK4b_zw.text: I'm so glad I found the new location! The freshest salads, incredible flat breads and wraps! It's a great alternative from heavy greasy food. My husband and I look forward to stopping by every time we are in town. My favorite is the Bianco flatbread. If you like white pizza you will LOVE the Bianco. Also the Cali salad is amazing. We highly recommend you give Crunch a try. You won't be disappointed. Oh, and did I mention the great service and friendly people?

9C7lHthDqLTz_kesDCrUyw.text: Popped in here for the first time for a quick dinner and will totally be back - soon!  My salad (BBQ Santa Fe) was so fresh and delicious.  The chicken had so much flavor and the dressing was really good.  I was impressed with how clean and nice the space was - even peering back into the kitchen.  My husband had a flatbread pizza which looked really good.  I was too into my salad to even ask for a bite before he finished it.    Small space with less than 10 tables, seems like a better place to grab food to go.  Will be back!

GnQOmsMpNlpI3J5DdnwsoA.text: This place is awesome! Guilt free food that tastes delicious! The staff is always very warm and friendly.  I love that there are so many options to choose from. The wraps are huge I usually can't eat the whole thing in one setting unless I'm extremely hungry.  I love the fact that you can turn any of the salads into a wrap  nom-nom.

D9F2scJtMdUUrlND1qU4GA.text: I was excited to try this place as I have heard nothing but great reviews. The place is clean and staff is very friendly. I also like how they put the calorie count next to the prices. The prices are reasonable. I ordered the Buffalo Bleu Salad to go and it looked delicious. Unfortunately, after getting home and eating it, I  found 'grit" in 3 bites.  I thought at first, maybe the onions but, no, it was 'grit' like the lettuce hadn't been washed. I had to toss it.

ew5-6zHjexnus_YyxLsx5A.text: Good portions! Great value!  Healthy menu. I have been in twice and both times I order Cilantro Chicken Bowl and there is a heap of tender chicken that crown the quinoa, tomato, corn dish with a good balance of cilantro sauce/dressing.  I always sample Their daily soups, and I always end up getting a cup because it is good and yummy.  My son ordered the barbecue chicken flatbread, and he was satisfied - favor wise and portion wise.   I will continue to come to this place since I shop next door at Trader Joe's.

e9V9ATfDhILc6tqQ-SvvGg.text: I was very pleased with Crunch Bistro, and I have to say, I have never been served a salad that was more fresh. Normally, you are bound to find at least one semi-gross item in a salad; whether it be a rotting piece of lettuce or a slimy spinach leaf...there's always something. The lettuce in my Cobb salad was perfection. Delicious and fresh. They used a fresh avocado and I received a half in my salad, hand cut right before my eyes. The dressing was perfect. Everything was so yummy. The employees were young and when I was there they had a lunch rush- a line of people extending to the door. They were fast, professional, and performed extremely well under pressure. They were friendly with me and my baby daughter and said hello to us as soon as things calmed down. I will be back!  One critique, the shape of the salad bowl was very deep and narrow, making it difficult to eat and get a good distribution of toppings and dressing from top to bottom.

cHSVZVh19W-UvqenJnz1vA.text: Very tasty salad here and filling portions I also appreciate the rewards card I recommend the cilantro lime dressing it's really good

P8L01-H-z29PPlkJOQ5iAg.text: I went yesterday and was so pleased. I chose to make my own creation and was so pleasantly surprised. My daughter also chose to make her own salad and also was pleasantly surprised. This place definitely gets my vote I will go back there time and time again. The environment is inviting and very clean staff was knowledgeable and it was done in excellence which I love.

photos.caption: Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. Second time around and enjoying my salad

9kSZQ4H4DWnyLQVpnq-OAA.text: Ordered online and food was ready 15 minutes later. Ordered the pepperoni flatbread and it was amazing. You can truly tell how fresh the ingredients are. I also ordered the Greek salad and it was exactly what you want when you order a Greek salad.  Plenty of olives and feta and tomatoes, not like some salads where ingredients are skimpy. Will definitely be coming back.

mcnxr9h0Dwug6u_xka3i5w.text: This place is hardly a healthy alternative if your ordering a salad it mostly consist of lettuce with four topping if your making your own; which ends up looking like bird toppings sprinkled on top. Everything else is considered premium toppings costing additional for each. The salmon quinoa bowl is sprayed with a thick layer of sysco cooking spray yuck! I don't know why they don't ask you first that stuff is toxic, better option would be coconut oil or olive oil. I had to request them give me new spinach cause I didn't want any spray on it. The girl at the register was not friendly at all however the asian girl was and every table was dirty covered with food on them. Overall i would not waste my money here again easier to go to the store and spend less making your own to your liking.

8bvBqoX3v3Rp-l40xx5WuA.text: Good fresh food.   The staff was impatient to move us along even though no one else was there.   They did not explain how it worked.   If I'm going to pay this kind of money I'd rather go to Chopped.

yf4qJ9KcVAnCgIqeWkqyAA.text: This restaurant is great! I love how they treat me. I've been coming since they've opened, freakin delicious!!

FpUQ_sL54X2wGFV0J2svmQ.text: Was upset when this place closed at the mall... So glad to have it reopen with an expanded menu!

7oOixDjSd6Ez4VmFQIFtiw.text: The wraps are large enough for two adults. Some of the best soups in the area. The lobster bisque and the roasted tomato artichoke soups are to die for!  Can't wait to try the salads!

eD_uzOBAOUZGFxrurK9mbQ.text: Not only did I leave feeling satisfied, I loved my Toscana Bowl. I was hesitant to go at first because I'm generally not in the mood to get a salad. However, I was surprised to see a full menu with wraps and flatbreads for people like me who love their bread while trying to be healthier. It's right next to the greenway so it's perfect for right before a walk or after!

9MaGUARNZW9VFmCB1rrc3w.text: This place deserves 5 stars hands down. Like many folks, we stopped in 2 weeks ago just to check it out and grab a menu. We figured we would give it the once over and then stop back when the time was right.  My wife and I went for a walk on the greenway with our 2 yr daughter and decided to stop in for a bite to eat.   The service was amazing. Ivan and Jonathan (I had to get their names because I wanted to make sure they got recognized) were so nice and made us feel right at home. The place is clean and stylish. The food was EXCELLENT! We had the BBQ flatbread and the chicken Caesar wrap on the garlic wrap. Can't say enough about the speed of the service, the quality of the food and the atmosphere inside.  This is exactly what this shopping center needs and our family will be returning soon to try some more delectable bites.   Go give this place a try....we need a place like this to stick around.

06EaFmHtCCHSo0f0brAAZA.text: Great new spot!! Quick service healthy food spot!!  Finally!! Salads are big and the quinoa bowls are awesome! Very good stuff!

VD3Ozmb_IMraBxNFfmtrhg.text: Got the buffalo chicken flatbread. I was satisfied it was delicious, but the prices are a bit high for what you get. All in all I would go back and try out other parts of the menu. Love the small outdoor seating, I ate outside with my dogs after walking four mile creek greenway.

RMoSN2Xs4BV-5JX8MWTPAw.text: we love the fresh amazing food and the staff is pretty awesome!! it's my new daily lunch spot!

photos.caption: Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. I am so happy this place finally open!! everything is super fresh and delicious! The staff is amazing and friendly

URLLuY_D6k4eW42if-oX0Q.text: A large selection of fresh salads, wraps and flatbreads. A healthy alternative to fast food restaurants.

9clPt86oAzvZ9TqGSsjk-g.text: It is like a healthy version of subway with wraps and salads.  Staff was very nice . I loved the  Tilipia wrap. The menu had so many good choices. When we sat down a lady that was leaving said she loved the Citrus salad. I want to go back so I can try their banana pudding.

ric-y01ldoWRWuX9D6WBEA.text: I eat here atleast twice a week, and it never disappoints. The ranch is amazing, and the customer service is great. Except for one person. Every time i go in there he is rude and never looks me in the eyes. But don't let one person stop you from trying this amazing place. It's quick and reasonably priced.  They also have a punch card, so take advantage of that

H1zfe69ggJsPzt6XbR6Adg.text: Ate at Crunch one day by myself to try it out as I kept seeing an Instagram influencer that I follow talk about it so much. Loved it SO much that I had to come back the following week with my husband. He is a bit more opinionated about things but he LOVED it as well. I have had the Chicken Cobb, Buffalo Bleu Wrap and the Turkey Bacon wrap. All SO good but the Buffalo is my fave. I will be dreaming about it till I go again...maybe tomorrow? Too soon?!

R_HF6pjtUuvsCuQS0wrGEg.text: This is our favorite place for Acai bowls. So fresh. So healthy. So good!!!  Everything else we have tried has been equally delicious and healthy. The prices are SO reasonable. It is also a great stop before or after a nice walk on the greenway across the street. You just can't go wrong here.

uZl77_wpgro0GRSRywM5Eg.text: Very good! First time and will def be back again! I'm not really into healthy food, but am trying. It was so good I'd get it just to get it. Employees are kind too!

VkJSH90aObWQDexLV7O5Ig.text: A great healthy and cost-effective option! Their salads and wraps are delicious. My boyfriend and I had the buffalo bleu salad and crunch chicken wrap--both were fresh and absolutely delicious. Staff is friendly and prompt.

So5UuZy11VGCu6OdZ0AwqQ.text: My dining mate and I enjoyed our salads at this small bistro. Menu has all kinds of salads with proteins ( salmon, tilapia, , turkey, chicken,  bacon, tuna, etc, flat breads, wraps, soups, quinoa bowls, and  kid's meals . Ingredients are fresh, soups delivered  daily from their distributor. One can compose their own salads also from the fresh medley of ingredients . Prices moderate.  Atmosphere clean and light and bright in small bistro. Soda, juices and water in cooler.  Desserts such as fresh fruit, granola bar and homemade banana pudding. We enjoyed our fresh salads which were very tasty with generous portions of ingredients. Chicken was warm and tender, veges very fresh. Staff accommodating and friendly.

photos.caption: Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. Crunch chicken salad, sans wrap
Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. Italian chicken salad bowl
Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. Salad ingredients

LtaGMbiSVdq_5BMUPTJ07A.text: Somewhat shocked by the bad reviews.    Location was *very clean* to the point I felt self-conscious sitting down in my running gear; it is located next to the greenway, so it makes a great healthy option after a long run or walk.  Ordered the Pollo Picante, a quinoa bowl with chicken, black beans, jalapenos, cilantro, and spicy dressing.  Was wonderful but a little too much heat for my tastes.  Lady ordered the margherita flatbread.  Was wonderful and light. Everything appeared and tasted fresh  Anyone looking for healthy options in the area should definitely check this out.  Only suggestions:   1)  wish there was another 4-seater outdoor table.  2)  would be nice if there was option to sub in tofu for the other proteins.

szZm_hfFa10zji9UlEHlUQ.text: Wasn't bad, nice decor and atmosphere. Workers are pleasant. It's a great healthy option, helps if you are looking for food that will make you feel good about yourself. Good vegetarian options and lights such as acai bowls!

hEm7JdUxYdyVZEA9rKqFRw.text: After reading so many fab reviews about Crunch, we had to give them a try, and we're so glad we did! We placed an order for delivery recently: a Crunch Chicken Wrap, a BBQ Santa Fe Salad, a Cilantro Chicken Quinoa Bowl and a Pesto Portabella Flatbread. All exceeded our expectations with the exception of the Flatbread which was missing its cheese and had a meager amount of veggies. Considering it is priced about the same as the first three items I mentioned, I recommend sticking with those categories. We will definitely be ordering from Crunch in the future!

hp_Ut1w12ap-wwJUCHWY2g.text: So yummy! Great lunch spot and $6 wraps on Wednesday's! The ranch was really good and all the ingredients were super super fresh! In and out pretty quick and the staff was friendly! Only down fall is it's a pretty busy shopping center but the wrap was so good I'll go back!

iSX60vwW2ifpnClHKHzc-Q.text: Went here today for the first time, it was definitely worth the drive from Mooresville. I got the cilantro chicken quinoa bowl, everything was extremely fresh and delicious. I can't wait to go back to try something different, they had so much to choose from. Loved the fact they made everything right in front of you too. Only negative there isn't more in charlotte

photos.caption: Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States

fUhPYe-rRK6sf-QcSVjnHA.text: my dad and I ate here after going to Trader Joe's and Great Harvest. Wed is $6 wrap special. I had the chicken crunch and he had chicken salad, both on spinach wraps. delish. will definitely eat here again.

photos.caption: Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. dad

2uKOgsnjenwnG8F9AxqeoQ.text: There is a very good reason this is called "CRUNCH" Bistro.  If these are not the freshest ingredients in town I don't know where to find any fresher.  Food is fantastic and the staff - totally customer oriented and ultra friendly.  Usually get the Crunch Chicken wrap and the Cilantro Quinoa bowl.  Both consistently great.  If you are anywhere near this location  (in the same center as Trader Joe's) you owe it to yourself to give them a try.

JFxg6gcvRyHYvPDxQx-e_A.text: My buffalo bleu chicken salad was crunchy, fresh, and very tasty. The poblano white cheddar soup was creamy, with a little kick...amazingly good! The staff is very friendly!   Totally a great healthy & tasty option!

photos.caption: Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States

tlCbAXhURVjUzs4rmWKPHQ.text: After going to a competitor and receiving horrible service...good salad, but bad service I decided to try y'all! I'm so glad I did! Overall the experience was great...I loved being able to fill out a card for my salad selections, the young man behind the counter was super fast at making my food and communicated to the cashier what I ordered so I had paid for it before it was done being made. I would love there to be a beef option for my salad and the grilled chicken was a little dry...but like I said, overall very nice! Clean inside, gleaming white interior...

GVLRhdrpldUqmjMkIK7_sw.text: Today was the 2nd time at this amazing place. Is this a chain ?? Nope ...looks like it is a local thing that started at a kiosk in South Park Mall. It is AMAZING so good ...clean nice staff in a great little strip mall. We quickly got the crunch card to get it punched each visit to get a free lunch. It will get filled up VERY quick. I had the veggie wrap...I say this with 100% honesty...it's the best I have ever had. Hubby had Spicy Buffalo Flat Bread ...he wanted to get 2 of them they were so good. So my advise...GO There Now!!

mlWkHHtClfRBycxkxucySw.text: Had lunch with my two daughters today.  My gluten free daughter had a delicious SW quinoa bowl and my vegetarian daughter had the veggie wrap and loved it.  I enjoyed my salmon quinoa bowl.  Crunch Bistro made it easy for all of us to eat together!

6Y-4pqCgwhRNviOXkayrIQ.text: The Asian Crunch salad was simple, fresh, and delicious. Very generous portion as well. I will definitely be coming back.

photos.caption: Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. Baked Salmon Quinoa Bowl

uQA1uEQk6CbZhjSDgo_IZw.text: Fresh,fast and healthy. I really enjoyed the spinach feta quinoa Bowl. Ask for Meghan if you have questions. She is helpful

U714vYzTlHoj5FnBpcB6vw.text: I love this place!   They have healthy, great tasting salads, wraps, flatbread pizzas, and quinoa bowls.  I remember this place inside Southpark Mall a few years back, but now they've opened one in Piper Glen.  My favorite is the BBQ Santa Fe but I've heard great things about all their items.  I noticed that they always have a great selection of unique soups as well.  Not the typical stuff you see a Panera or other sandwich places.    You can't go wrong at Crunch Bistro.  It's a super clean and modern looking place and the service is good too.

o6BWRmd85kawlfBRHfIlfA.text: After cruising by this place for a few years now I finally decided to give it a try and was not disappointed! I got the BBQ Santa Fe salad and swapped grilled onions instead of red onions and it was really tasty. I tend to feel underwhelmed whenever I go to Chopt, so I definitely plan to come to Crunch Bistro more often. They had Italian Wedding and Tomato Tortellini soup for the day and while I really wanted to try the soup, I'm glad I didn't because the salad alone filled me up completely. Will try the soup next time though!  Also, the restaurant is pretty small. Very narrow with just a few small tables, maybe 4 or so. I would recommend grab and go, which is what I did.

FsGs-Q41V6uXiJYxYHev5w.text: I needed to get some greens in after the weekend I had and this place is great for loading up on veggies. They have salads with pre-determined veggies or you can build your own. With wraps and acai bowls this is great spot for "eating your vegetables"as prescribed by Mom. I got the Greek Isles salad and it was yummy.

photos.caption: Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. I got the Greek Isles&#34; and it was yummy

2n5isZAP49q17BYdGvGypg.text: Came in here a few weeks ago for a couple of salads. Had a kale Caesar salad with chicken and another Kale salad with grilled Salmon. The staff was super nice and attentive but as soon as I started seeing the ingredients I knew I wasn't going to like my salad. The kale was kinda yellowish at the ends like the bags of kale were a little old and then the salmon that was going on my salad was literally an already overcooked peice of salmon that was popped into a convection oven before my eyes.  When I ate the salad, it tasted like I expected. The salmon was dry and just not good. I didn't eat most of my salad. My husband finished his kale Caesar with chicken but wasn't so crazy about it that he would go back. I would maybe go back here and have like a vegetarian wrap or something with only veggies.  I would definitely not order anything with meat again.  The prices weren't bad but that doesn't help if I don't actually eat what I bought. I would rather pay a few more dollars and not get a precooked overcooked piece of salmon.

photos.caption: Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. Chicken Caesar w kale
Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. Craft your own salad with Salmon...i would have it without the salmon next time

xsf6vEcc69F9sGd_h8kjfw.text: This is a great addition to south Charlotte where you can create your own salad, had the Waldorf salad it was delicious.

Z-eJz8DbLYFFWdOYzT4KMg.text: Excellent and tasty healthy food that is delicious! I tried the cilantro chicken quinoa bowl based on the rave reviews and it's amazingly yummy and healthy. The quinoa is fluffy and light and seasoned perfectly with the cilantro sauce.  The cilantro sauce gives a creamy yet light flavor to the bowl. The chicken is savory and tender and the roma tomatoes and corn are delicious. It's an awesome combination of chicken and quinoa! I felt satisfied and healthy! Definitely want to return here and try the wraps and flat breads too.  I just had to sample the homemade banana pudding. The banana pudding was amazing!!  Parking is in the lot and it's a busy place (with Trader Joe's nearby).

photos.caption: Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. Cilantro Chicken Bowl

NTxU1zH_nlbOiQttJSsbgQ.text: Crunch Bistro is everything. The veggies are fresh, the chicken is INCREDIBLY flavorful and tender, and the wraps are filled to the brim! I cannot recommend this place enough. They have wraps, bowls, salads, flatbreads-everything you could want! Special shoutout to the Chicken Caesar wrap, which is my go-to.

photos.caption: Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States

t378RmabyYdFAkMV8Hhy6g.text: Crunch Bistro. Holy hell. I honestly wasn't even going to review this place until after I had started eating my wrap from there. Shame on me. As soon as I took my first bite, I got excited to leave a review. Best fast casual experience I think I have ever had.  My girlfriend and I were going to catch a movie in Ballantyne and saw that Crunch was just a little ways away, so we decided to stop by. The restaurant is very clean and bright, and the two people that helped me were super nice and helpful.   I got a custom wrap with chicken, romaine, cucumber, onion, pepper, bacon, croutons, and honey mustard. Did I say wrap? I mean BURRITO. This dude loaded me up so hard I felt bad for him trying to roll it up into one wrap. Speaking of wraps, they had wheat, spinach, tomato basil, and one other that sounded great. I went with tomato basil and it was a noticeable difference.  The best thing about the wrap was hands down the chicken. EVERY single bite I had the chicken was charred and juicy. Imagine the best chicken you've ever had from chipotle and then imagine that in every bite you take. Just so damn good.  The guy that served me let me know they have $6 wraps on Wednesdays which is insane. Even if you go on a normal day it's super worth it.  CAN'T WAIT TO GO BACK!

photos.caption: Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. Custom wrap filled to the brim!

zjDAzPMEuAIQqMFwvUeAbA.text: Come on man! Could this tiny little "salad joint" really be as good as all of its five star reviews on Yelp? Well... Yupp! Even at 7:30 on a Saturday night with only one incredibly capable and talented young man named Johnnathan working, the entire place was immaculate, the service was fast, friendly and efficient, and the food was as superb as it was fresh. I'm going to cut to the chase and state up front that this place is indeed a Gotta Try so you can go ahead and head there now. You can read the rest of my review in the car on the way (and you'd be wise to also take a peek at the menu as it is extensive.)  Speaking of the menu, it includes all kinds of healthy stuff served up as salads, wraps, flatbread and grain bowls. My wife and I went conservative and ordered a Veggie Delight wrap and a Pesto Portobella flatbread. The actual wraps themselves are available with white, wheat or spinach flour, which is a nice touch in itself. I opted for the spinach flour and only added cilantro to the wrap's baby spinach, cukes, grilled Bu on Mushrooms, tomatoes, shredded carrots, roasted red peppers, caramelized onions, jalapenos, feta cheese and house cilantro lime dressing. It was excellent, as was the flatbread, that included goat cheese, pesto, portabella mushrooms, spinach, fomatoes and parmesan. The total bill ran $22 including two fountain drinks.  With the speed and bravada of a Nakata Japanese chef, Johnnathan expertly prepared our food, was conscientious enough to remove sanitary gloves before collecting money, checked us out, put on new gloves, handled his next customers, and then walked around the small dining area cleaning off the tables and checking on us customers. Very impressive indeed!  The only negative as far as I'm concerned is that the dining area is so darned small. Unless you get one of the two tables in front of the windows, the rest of the tables are very tight. In fact, I felt like I had to shift forward every time someone walked behind me. So, in conclusion, I give the place five stars as a take out option, and four stars for dining in. Either way, like I said earlier, it is a Gotta Try (especially  if the young Crunch Ninja is working.)

photos.caption: Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. Veggie Wrap
Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. The Pesto Portobella Flatbread

fHz97czjeX1P0LA6gDmCIA.text: Great little spot tucked into the row of shops next to Trader Joe's.   Go here if you want a fresh quinoa bowl or wrap or salad or soup.  They also have a kid's menu.  Today, I had a quinoa bowl with picante chicken.  My friend, VP, had a fresh salad that was large enough to feed all of south Charlotte.  My quinoa bowl had a decent amount of delicious chicken in it and was topped by many jalapeno slices. I would order the same dish again, and actually look forward to it.   While we were there, I noticed that there was not a lot of traffic coming through.  The place was very sleepy.   My guess is that people have just not discovered this as an option.  There is no other reason why people are not flocking here:   Good food, great sanitation score, and convenient location.  I hope this place makes it!

photos.caption: Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. Chicken picante quinoa bowl.
Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. Order at the counter.

98LX1R4lLHhcyDndPdc9Wg.text: What a pleasant surprise! I stopped here after shopping at Trader Joes.  It was the day that all wraps were $6 and I am so glad I stopped.  The wrap was exploding with fantastic, fresh veggies and was one of the best things to pass my lips in some time.  I had the Chicken Salad wrap and the chicken salad was well made and delicious.  I highly suggest you go in and give something a try, as I suspect that everything is as good as what we had. Also, they keep things very clean and it's well appointed, albeit small.  Not great for groups, but perfect for small lunch or take out!

4T7QCCcLopOneqp16yNf2Q.text: IF you are seeking a healthier tasty alternative Crunch Bistro is pretty amazing. We drove from Waxhaw and I would definitely make the drive out again, it was that special!   Breaking down their quinoa chicken bowl:  Quinoa: IF you enjoy quinoa bowls (I know, you have had them 100 X, NOT this good you haven't) their actual "quinoa" is excellent!! SOO hearty but yet light, fluffy & airy AND moreover FULL OF FLAVOR! It has to be 1 of the BEST quinoa versions I have to date! It was so crazy good I m  craving it now!   Chicken: Their "chicken quinoa bowl" ...O M G, their well marinated moist grilled chicken is  E X C E P T I O N A L !! The chicken spices are on point! How can a quinoa bowl be this GOOD, we were skeptical about how tasty this place would be before we arrived ...once we observed the chef in ACTION we knew we were DEAD wrong! Their priority is FRESH & FLAVORFUL and that's exactly what they delivered.   Citrus lime dressing: This is their MAGIC sauce that brings it ALL together ...request EXTRA as you will be glad you did. I LOVE their particular version as it's NOT overbearing, it allows the chicken & quinoa to continue to shine all the while it just compliments the dish. Perfect balance of citrus & lime!!  Dessert: Banana pudding w/ wafers & banana slices  The chef was so cool he brought my husband & I 2 bowls of their super popular banana pudding on the house. That as well was delicious.   Their "Bianco pesto flatbread" was GOOD but in all honesty we preferred their chicken quinoa bowl.   Highly recommend!   ENJOY

photos.caption: Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. Bianco flatbread ...great choice!
Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. Banana pudding was so tasty...wafers &amp; banana slices ...yum!
Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. Excellent healthy choice...scrumptious!

1fSt60sJjbHxLTJi8udnUQ.text: This was my first time eating here and I was very pleased. The chicken salad was delicious, the restaurant was clean and the service was great. Two you men  Mikey and Isaiah helped me. They were very polite and courteous. When I was eating, the manager Raven came to my table to see if I need anything and to make sure I was happy with my food and service. This was great customer service. These young adults gave me better service than other restaurants with older staff members.

xmav1dTn7NQ1BqJ706e_2w.text: Great fast fresh spot in south Charlotte. You go up front and can order a wrap, salad, or flatbread from their menu or you can build your own.  Be warned, the place is extremely small and cramped so not good for groups but makes for a good take out spot. It's always been very clean when I go.  Service was slow today as a new girl was training.    I usually get the BBQ santa fe salad - sub spicy ranch for regular ranch.  There is something about the combination of bbq sauce and ranch that I love!  The salad portions are huge! I usually can't finish the whole thing.    They offer free kids meal on Sunday w/ an adult entree purchase and also $6 dollar wraps on Wednesdays!

DLCvoWjuLQeQ9zT76f_SjA.text: We came here last week for a quick bite. I've been craving a good salad place in Charlotte and found this spot after a Yelp search. The staff was so friendly, and the food was so fresh! We tried the Cali crunch salad, tomato tortellini soup and veggie wrap. Portions and prices were great.  Can't wait to go back!

Ej1mvfzmqEJvgF58j_Js5w.text: I'm sold especially with the Kids eat FREE on Sunday with the purchase of an adult entree. Not to mention the fact that this place is in the same lot as Olive This and Trader Joe's which both are my Sunday go to's .  I had a yummy cranberry and goat cheese spinach salad  which was awesome. My husband had a flatbread which he enjoyed and our son had a cheese flatbread which he enjoyed. Glad we got a chance to check this place out. The process is like a sandwich line, you can see all the ingredients and ask for what you want on your salad, flatbread or wrap. The staff is pretty cool and appear to love their job from our experience as they were happy and helpful which are two great qualities.

photos.caption: Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. Inside
Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. Outside
Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. So many fresh ingredients

IE-4mPKS4V6jLUgeg-aYxA.text: I was going home while picking my son up from school. He requested me to take him at crunch Bistro so we went there.  Nice interior, clean and helpful staffs, I liked that.  My son ordered buffalo chicken wrap with his favorite ingredients. All meat and vegetables looks freshly made. My son enjoyed his meal and said thank you dad to bring me this place.  Next time, I am gonna try with my whole family.

xk86ynI2kpX21zuks78JYA.text: The pollo picante needed something, like avocado or fresh spinach, something,anything fresh. The veggie wrap was perfect though. It's a nice stop for lunch and very filling. They just need to make that quinoa bowl a little more interesting. I don't even think they added the cilantro.

VYEQpmM38JKFPmScuPTMWQ.text: I wasn't sure if we should eat here since my kids are picky but I figured flatbread = pizza and my other kids like cheese quesadillas plus it was in the same shopping plaza as Trader Joe's, so we gave it a shot and I'm so glad we did. I had the kale chicken caesar salad and hubby had the buffalo bleu salad. We both loved them. The salads tasted fresh and were a generous serving. I like that they gave us the dressing so we could choose how much dressing we wanted but I ended up using it all and could've used even more so it didn't matter in the end haha. I'd definitely go back again and want to try other things on the menu like one of the quinoa bowls.

photos.caption: Photo of Crunch Bistro - Charlotte, NC, United States. Half eaten cilantro chicken quinoa bowl  pretty good!

DGuu2cj_oIpjyRuIs7tXQg.text: The pollo picante bowl was so good. It's very spicy. It's a huge portion of quinoa. I almost wish they had a smaller bowl option because $10 is tad much for quinoa and chicken, but it was really good! Will definitely be putting it in our rotation.

vjzbJTpg9XN2Y3WwdtdgHg.text: So delicious and always fresh! Have tried many things and you just can't go wrong. Love how you can create your own or go with tried and True favorites.
